title: City Mouse and Country Mouse
moral_text: The moral is to mouse country.

title: Fox and the Grapes
moral_text: The moral is to grapes fox.

title: Wolf and Crane
moral_text: The moral is to wolf crane.

title: Lion and Mouse on His Mane
moral_text: The moral is to lion mane.

title: Fox and Goat in the Well
moral_text: The moral is to fox goat.
